                                        Date   11.12.2007 
 
                              C I R C U L A R   NO.  14/ 2007 
 
Sub :  Frisking of all personnel deployed with ground handling agencies leaving the 
airside tarmac / technical area of airports. 
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau Circular No. 19/2001 dated 15.10.2001 and 4/2007 
dated 19.2.2007, it is further instructed that all authorized personnel working with GHA while 
leaving airport from any gate(s) shall be subject to security checks (frisking / baggage search) 
by the airport security personnel manning those gates.  
 
2.        Receipt of this Circular may be acknowledged.  
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution: As per list attached / (Overleaf)
